original_title: Rodney Yee's Complete Yoga For Beginners: Yoga For Flexibility
overview: In this video with Rodney Yee, he focuses on building flexibility in the body. Stretch the body slowly and deeply with this relaxing practice that focuses on increasing your range of motion.
tagline: Easy-to-follow series that builds strength & improves flexibility.
title: Rodney Yee's Complete Yoga For Beginners: Yoga For Flexibility
